lexUnit.name: black.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: of the very darkest colour due to the absence of or complete absorption of light.

sentence.text: The fire gleamed in the grate , the kettle was boiling on the hob , steam issuing from the black lips of the spout and of Craig there was no sign .

The sky was totally black .

Her black velvet hat was slightly askew , held in that position by her hatpin .
